name: oh_telemetry_collector_load_testing
description: load test for OH Telemetry Collector Server

scripts.all: npm run rust && npm run java && npm run typescript
scripts.rust: artillery run  --output reports/report_rust.json  load_test_rust.yml && artillery report --output reports/report_rust.html reports/report_rust.json
scripts.java: artillery run  --output reports/report_java.json  load_test_java.yml && artillery report --output reports/report_java.html reports/report_java.json
scripts.typescript: artillery run  --output reports/report_typescript.json  load_test_typescript.yml && artillery report --output reports/report_typescript.html reports/report_typescript.json

author: Andrei Dodu
